title: Hero MotoCorp announces resignation of Malo Le Masson
description: Prior to joining Hero MotoCorp Le Masson was leading the product strategy function at Infiniti Motor Company, where he worked as Global Head of Infiniti Product Long Term Strategy. He has significant experience in product planning through his stints with Nissan Motor Co across geographies, including Japan, France, Hong Kong, Netherlands and Switzerland.
